name: Squarvive
description:
There's not much to say about this game. I have a thing for top down, pixel, melee, and zombie survival games. So I thought, what's best but to put them all together and make my own game. I was working on this game for a few weeks, but stop due to other commitments coming up. I plan on coming back to this game in due time. If you think the concept is cool let me know below!

Instructions: Walk - WASD | Aim - Mouse | Right Punch - R_Click | Left Punch - L_Click |Right Special - Shift + R_Click | Left Special - Shift + L_Click
